Top January Stories: Docker for Data Science; Top 10 TED Talks for Data Scientists and Machine Learning Engineers

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: Top stories

Also: Quantum Machine Learning: An Overview; Comparing Machine Learning as a Service: Amazon, Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud AI


By Gregory Piatetsky, KDnuggets.
Here are the most popular blogs in January 2018, based on both unique page views (UPV) and social shares.

Most Viewed - Gold Badges (>12,000 UPV)

  1. Docker for Data Science, by Sachin Abeywardana
  2. Quantum Machine Learning: An Overview, by Reena Shaw
  3. Top 10 TED Talks for Data Scientists and Machine Learning Engineers, by Ilan Reinstein


Most Viewed - Silver Badges (> 5,000 UPV)

  1. Comparing Machine Learning as a Service: Amazon, Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud AI, by Altexsoft
  2. The Art of Learning Data Science, by Aparna C Shastry
  3. How to build a Successful Advanced Analytics Department, by Filip Stachura (*)
  4. Want to Become a Data Scientist? Try Feynman Technique, by Venkat Raman (*)
  5. Becoming a Data Scientist, by Amir Feizpour (*)
  6. How Docker Can Help You Become A More Effective Data Scientist, by Hamel Husain (*)


Most Shared - Gold Badges (>1,200 shares)

  1. Top 10 TED Talks for Data Scientists and Machine Learning Engineers, by Ilan Reinstein
  2. Comparing Machine Learning as a Service: Amazon, Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud AI, by Altexsoft
  3. Quantum Machine Learning: An Overview, by Reena Shaw
  4. The Art of Learning Data Science, by Aparna C Shastry (*)


Most Shared - Silver Badges (>650 shares)

  1. Becoming a Data Scientist, by Amir Feizpour
  2. How Docker Can Help You Become A More Effective Data Scientist, by Hamel Husain
  3. A Beginner's Guide to Data Engineering - Part I, by Robert Chang (*)
  4. Docker for Data Science, by Sachin Abeywardana
  5. How to build a Successful Advanced Analytics Department, by Filip Stachura
  6. How To Grow As A Data Scientist, by Benjamin Rogojan (*)


(*) indicates that badge added or upgraded based on these monthly results.

Most Shareable (Viral) Blogs

Among the top blogs, here are the 5 blogs with the highest ratio of shares/unique views, which suggests that people who read it really liked it.
  1. Democratizing Artificial Intelligence, Deep Learning, Machine Learning with Dell EMC Ready Solutions, by William Schmarzo
  2. Top Stories, Dec 18-31: How Much Mathematics Does an IT Engineer Need to Learn to Get Into Data Science?; Computer Vision by Andrew Ng - 11 Lessons Learned
  3. Training and Visualising Word Vectors, by Priyanka Kochhar
  4. Top KDnuggets tweets, Dec 27 - Jan 02: 10 Free Must-Read Books for #MachineLearning and #DataScience
  5. Learning Curves for Machine Learning, by Alex Olteanu
